settings.title: Our Guarantee
settings.text: We stand behind the craftsmanship of our art prints.If you don’t love your purchase, we’ll send you a replacement or issue you a refund. You can keep the print on us.

settings.heading: "Great Quality"
settings.content: I was excited to get my print because it will be a precious gift for my daughter BUT I was NOT expecting the quality of paper to be as good as it is.It’s a very thick paper that will be perfect to frame.Thank you!
settings.title: — Julie F, Georgia, USA

settings.heading: "Beautiful"
settings.content: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this print when it arrived.Very thick, quality paper and just beautiful!I got it framed and love seeing it displayed in my home. I've gotten many compliments on it and plan to get another 1 or 2 as gifts.
settings.title: — Julie F, Georgia, USA

settings.heading: “Amazing!!!”
settings.content: When it came in the mail, I opened it and literally cried as I held it in my hands! My expectations were exceeded tremendously with this print.The quality of the paper, the actual printing of the ink and the raw edges...details that make it so specialand worthy of every penny spent.I am in loveand I can’t wait to share these gifts!!
settings.title: — Jennifer G, Kansas, USA

settings.heading: “Timeless Gift”
settings.content: This company delivers what they say:quality prints and art that arrive even more beautiful than what is pictured.These are gifts that will become heirlooms. Thank you for being one of the few companies that create andprovide excellence in their productand integrity in their customer service. 10 stars.
settings.title: — Amy L, Virginia, USA
What Our Customers Say
settings.text:
Our heart behind this business has always been to put our customers first. We believe
that not only does Jesus command us to treat others this way — it’s also just a better way
to do business. Here’s what some of our customers have to say about our products.

We are committed to crafting the best quality Art Prints in the most ethical way
possible. That’s why all our products are made in the USA.
Artwork born from divine inspiration, for those who love God's word

Our vision is straightforward: to craft exquisite artwork for those who cherish God's Word. Driven by our unwavering belief in the transformative power of Scripture Art, we aspire to create pieces that serve as tangible reminders of God's steadfast promises.

Each brushstroke is a catalyst for deep reflection, fostering meaningful conversations about faith with loved ones.

Your support and enthusiasm propel us forward on this journey of spreading inspiration and planting seeds of truth in hearts worldwide. Thank you for being a vital part of our mission.

settings.title: Centered by Christ
settings.text: Our reliance rests firmly on the Lord, and we steadfastly cling to the timeless truths of His Word. Jesus Christ is not only the cornerstone but also the guiding light illuminating every endeavor we undertake.

settings.title: Integrity
settings.text: With accountability to both God and every individual we meet, we uphold our commitment to honor Him through our unwavering dedication to honesty, fairness, and ethical conduct in all our dealings.

settings.title: Excellence
settings.text: From the meticulous craftsmanship of our products to the customer care journey, we tirelessly pursue excellence as a means of magnifying God's glory.
